location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas H Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran], to William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Thomas H Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran], to William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter sent on 4 December 1810 and its enclosures, regarding Concord Lodge, the house in Bushire owned by Bruce and rented by the Honorable Company, against the Persian Government's will.
